newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RESEARCH ALERT - JG Summit a long-term buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - JG Summit a long-term buy.

text.p: Urbancorp Securities Inc recommended on Tuesday a long-term buy on food-based conglomerate JG Summit Holdings Inc saying the stock was undervalued.

"Based on the company's 1997 income target of 3.813 billion pesos, JGS is currently trading at a 1997 P/E of 9.9 times. This offers a slight discount to the holding sector's P/E of 12.9 times in 1997 and a 22 percent discount to the company's net assets value of 10 pesos per share," Urbancorp said in a report.
It said subsidiary Universal Robina Corp, its major revenue contributor, is expected to turn in higher margins next year due to falling prices of raw materials.
"There are indications that major raw materials such as coffee, wheat and palm oil prices will soften further by at least 10 percent next year," the report added.
JG Summit closed at 7.60 pesos on Tuesday.
